Room.Name: Goblin Prison
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the long term prison area for the goblin underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: Mostly, the inmates here are goblins who cannot conform to the mores of goblin society. Non-goblins, especially humans and elves, never see this place, as they are usually taken directly to the holding cell for immediate disposal of their cases. There is a lot of yowling and agonized grunting taking place around you in the various cells here, but you don't see anyone you know. There is a strong smell of unwashed bodies and goblin waste.
